## SendableMosaic.transferCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferCollateralGainToTrove(): Promise<SentMosaicTransaction<S, MosaicReceipt<R, CollateralGainTransferDetails>>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentMosaicTransaction](./lib-base.sentmosaictransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MosaicReceipt](./lib-base.mosaicreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [CollateralGainTransferDetails](./lib-base.collateralgaintransferdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [MSIC reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.msicreward.md)<!-- -->.
